ns2:test-suite.name: As a whetherForecast service provider, I should be able to fetch the whether details from the application successfully
ns2:test-suite.title: As a whetherForecast service provider, I should be able to fetch the whether details from the application successfully

test-case.name: Verify that user can able to get correct most dominant conditions for forecast data.
test-case.title: Verify that user can able to get correct most dominant conditions for forecast data.

step.name: When I open the url http://localhost:3000/
step.title: When I open the url http://localhost:3000/

step.name: Then I should be able to launch the application with header "Five Day Weather Forecast for"
step.title: Then I should be able to launch the application with header "Five Day Weather Forecast for"

step.name: When I enter the Aberdeen for whetherforecast
step.title: When I enter the Aberdeen for whetherforecast

step.name: Then I should able to get most dominant weather conditions for Aberdeen among 5 days
step.title: Then I should able to get most dominant weather conditions for Aberdeen among 5 days

failure.message: For Aberdeen Most dominant condition is not matching for day 1
failure.stack-trace: AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: For Aberdeen Most dominant condition is not matching for day 1 at forecast.strictEqual [as DominantCondition] (/Users/prasadrsangpal/assign/prasad/bdd/pageObjects/forecast.js:34:16) at whetherPage.DominantCondition [as weatherCondition] (/Users/prasadrsangpal/assign/prasad/bdd/pageObjects/whetherPage.js:192:22) at World.weatherCondition (/Users/prasadrsangpal/assign/prasad/bdd/features/step_definitions/wheather.js:61:20)
